00029 class content_list
00030 {
00031     protected $list_template;
00032     protected $paging_enable = false;
00033     protected $criteria;
00034     protected $order;
00035     public $num_rows = 0;
00036 
00037 
00044     public function setListTemplate($str_template)
00045     {
00046         $this->list_template = $str_template;
00047     }
00048 
00049 
00056     public function setSQLcriteria($str_criteria)
00057     {
00058         $this->criteria = $str_criteria;
00059     }
00060 
00061

00069     {
00070         $this->order = $str_order;

00080     public function pagingEnable($bool_enable)
00081     {
00082         $this->paging_enable = $bool_enable;
00083     }

00092     protected function parseListTemplate($array_associative_data)
00093     {
00094         if (!$this->list_template) {
00095             echo 'There is no template for content list yet';
00096             return;
00097         }
00098 
00099         // get the template markers from regular expression
00100         preg_match_all("/\{[a-z_]+?\}/", $this->list_template, $matches);
00101         $_markers = $matches[0];
00102 
00103         // result buffer var
00104         $_result = $this->list_template;
00105         foreach ($_markers as $_each_marker) {
00106             $_index = str_replace(array('{','}'), '', $_each_marker);
00107             if (isset($array_associative_data[$_index]) AND $array_associative_data[$_index]) {
00108                 $_result = str_replace($_each_marker, $array_associative_data[$_index], $_result);
00109             } else {
00110                 $_result = str_replace($_each_marker, '', $_result);
00111             }
00112         }
00113 
00114         return $_result;
00115     }
00116 }
00117 ?>
